OOC: Goodbye, bro, and thanks for playing! See ya in the real world!

Bic:

Tyrael was intrigued. How could three bases be on this planet? Ho 
well, they'll have to destroy one more, nothing more.

Tyrael: Very well, Naga. You will stay here to guard the base. Shadow 
Star, you will command group Tripod, with you and Burrock. You will 
attack the most northern base (ooc: maxies). Talon and me, as group 
Trian, will attack the nearest one (ooc: preddies). Remember, this is 
a hit and run. Our objectives are to pinpoint them and hit hard if 
possible. Break off the engagement at any signs of heavy defense. 
Everyone ready?

Burrock: An attack already... I think I might like you, lightbird! Any 
casualties allowed?

Tyrael: Just as long as its not one of you, the more, the better.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14" <black_ben14@h...> wrote:
